title: Looking for girls to play with
body:
Im a Diamond smurf looking to help carry some people
Your age must be legal
You must be atleast gold or higher
Be good at the role you play

replies.body:
"must have skype and live alone
must have low standards
preferably single or your boyfriend has to be okay with having someone watch
must have at least a GED or Highscool Diploma to apply
BA Degree in Fine Arts helps move things along"

and i would have laughed. sadly i must uphold my duties and cringe and cry for society.
im very hot grill pls boost me

enjoy the report

Why? No girl wants to play with someone who only wants to play with them since they're girls. Especially when you say things like their age has to be legal. It's a game to make friends, not for you to try (and miserably fail) to pick up girls.
Guys don't take it to the heart. Learn to take some jokes
